alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Otero, southwestern Kiowa, east central Crowley and northwestern Bent Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong cluster of thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Wild Horse Point to 6 miles north of Arlington to 10 miles east of Sugar City. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Arlington around 515 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Haswell and Blue Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
